org.mindswap.owls.process.variable
Interface Binding<V extends ProcessVar>

All Superinterfaces:
OWLEntity, OWLIndividual, OWLObject, OWLValue
All Known Subinterfaces:
InputBinding, LinkBinding, LocBinding, OutputBinding
All Known Implementing Classes:
BindingImpl, InputBindingImpl, LinkBindingImpl, LocBindingImpl, OutputBindingImpl
public interface Binding<V extends ProcessVar>
extends OWLIndividual

Corresponding OWL-S concept: org.mindswap.owls.vocabulary.OWLS.Process#Binding.

The OWL-S property process:valueType is currently not accessible by this interface because we think that it is redundant to the type of the target process variable that can be accessed via someBinding.getProcessVar().getParamType() anyway.

Method Detail

getProcessVar

V getProcessVar()
Returns:
The process variable that is bound by the value specification of this binding.

setProcessVar

V setProcessVar(V procVar)
Set the the process variable that is bound by the value specification of this binding.

Parameters:
procVar - The target process variable to set.
Returns:
The previous variable that was set (if any).
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If procVar is null.

getValue

ParameterValue getValue()
Returns:
Object that specifies how the target process variable is bound to the actual value.

isValueConstantBinding

boolean isValueConstantBinding()
Returns:
true if the target variable is bound to a constant value.

isValueOfBinding

boolean isValueOfBinding()
Returns:
true if the target variable is bound to a ValueOf description, i.e, the value is taken from another variable of the enclosing composite process, or a Perform in the scope of the enclosing process.

isValueFormBinding

boolean isValueFormBinding()
Returns:
true if the target variable is bound to a value form description.

isValueFunctionBinding

boolean isValueFunctionBinding()
Returns:
true if the target variable is bound to a value function description.

setValue

void setValue(ParameterValue value)
Parameters:
value - The value to bind with the target variable.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if value is null.
